# Smart Task Manager with AI Priority - Workspace Instructions

## Project Overview
MERN stack application for intelligent task management with AI-driven priority assignment.

## Tech Stack
- **Backend**: Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, JWT Authentication
- **Frontend**: React.js with Kanban board UI
- **AI**: Rule-based priority engine with optional OpenAI integration

## Project Structure
- `/backend` - Express.js API server
- `/frontend` - React.js application

## Development Guidelines
- Follow RESTful API conventions
- Use JWT for authentication
- Implement proper error handling
- Write clean, modular code
- Use environment variables for sensitive data
